raw_body: Precious husband of Kanniyamary Singarayar, loving father of James, Regina, Bede, Lawrence, and Fatima, loving grandfather of Darren, Nikkita, Joel, Steffan, Gerald, Mystica and Deandra. Remains lie at No. 2, 3rd Lane, Captain Premil Perera Mawatha, Maradana Road, Hendala, Wattala. Cortege leaves residence on February 29th 2024 at 3.00 p.m. for burial at Nayakakanda Roman Catholic Cemetery.
